experiences.description: Developed and maintained ETL pipelines for various clients, focusing on data migration and data warehousing solutions. Used SQL, Informatica, and Oracle databases.

Designed and implemented data solutions for a large e-commerce client, including building data lakes and optimizing data pipelines using Spark and Hadoop.  Responsible for data quality and data governance.

Led a team of data engineers in developing and maintaining a scalable data platform on AWS. Implemented data governance policies and ensured data security compliance.  Developed data models and visualizations using Tableau to provide actionable insights to stakeholders. Mentored junior engineers.

education.description: Completed a Bachelor of Technology degree with a focus on data structures, algorithms, and database management systems.  Participated in various coding competitions and hackathons.

Earned a Master of Science degree specializing in Data Science and Information Management. Coursework included machine learning, data mining, and big data analytics. Thesis focused on optimizing data warehousing for real-time analytics.
